original_text: So Jesus called them over to him and began to speak to them in parables: “How can Satan drive out Satan?
korean_text: 예수께서 그들을 불러다가 비유로 말씀하시되 사탄이 어찌 사탄을 쫓아낼 수 있느냐

sentences.original_text: So Jesus called them over to him
and began to speak to them in parables:
How can Satan drive out Satan?
sentences.korean_translation: 사탄이 어떻게 사탄을 쫓아낼 수 있겠느냐?
